title: Genus Ophiogomphus
description: **_Ophiogomphus_**, the **snaketails**, is a genus of dragonfly in the family Gomphidae. The species mostly have beautifully marked green club-shaped abdomens, most noticeable in the males. In the world there is about 28 species, in Europe there is only one, *Ophiogomphus cecilia*, the green snaketail, green gomphid, or green club-tailed dragonfly.
sources: Field guide to the dragonflies of Britain and Europe, Klaas-Douwe B Dijkstra.
